source_sentence: 佛說隨勇尊者經
translation: Foshuo fuyong zunzhe jing

source_sentence: 西天譯經三藏朝奉大夫試
translation: Testimony of the Chaofeng Dafu, Tripiṭaka Translator of the Western Paradise

source_sentence: 光祿卿傳法大師賜紫沙門
translation: Vaiśravaṇa bestowed by the Great Master Guangluqing Chuanfa

source_sentence: 臣施護等奉　詔譯
translation: Translated by imperial decree by ministers Shi Hao and others

source_sentence: 如是我聞：一時，佛在王舍城迦蘭陀竹林精舍，與苾芻眾俱。
translation: Thus I have heard: One time, the Buddha was staying at the Kalandaka's Bamboo Grove monastery in Rājagṛha with a group of monks.

source_sentence: 時有尊者名曰隨勇，在王舍城側尸陀林間，蛇聚孤峯之上大僧坊中，而獨經行。
translation: At the time, a certain Venerable Ārya named Ārya was walking alone in a large monastery on top of a lonely peak near the city of Rājagṛha in the midst of a cluster of snakes in the Śītā Forest.

source_sentence: 忽為毒蛇之所噬蠚，蛇之身形瘦細精光、猛惡可畏，如安惹那舍羅迦。
translation: Suddenly, he was stung by a viper whose body was thin, fine, shiny, and fierce, like Anjanasrāja.

source_sentence: 即時，隨勇尊者呼苾芻眾謂言：「諸尊者！
translation: Immediately, Venerable Fuyong called the crowd of monks and regents and said, "Venerables!

source_sentence: 我為毒蛇之所噬蠚，膚體潰壞，今宜置我於僧坊外，無令延毒而復流散。」
translation: I've been devoured by a viper and my skin has broken, so now it would be better to put me outside the monastery so that the poison won't spread again."

source_sentence: 是時，尊者舍利子去隨勇尊者所止不遠，在一樹下坐，聞彼隨勇發如是言，聞已即時往詣其所，到已謂言：「尊者隨勇！
translation: Not far from where Venerable Śāriputra was staying, he was sitting under a tree when he heard that Venerable Śrī Siṃyong had spoken in this way.

source_sentence: 我向觀汝面及諸根，本無異相，何故今時乃發是聲？」
translation: I've looked at your face and your faculties, and there was nothing different about them, so why have you made this noise now?"

source_sentence: 隨勇答言：「尊者！
translation: They replied, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我為毒蛇之所噬蠚，膚體潰壞，今宜置我於僧坊外，無令延毒而復流散。
translation: I've been devoured by a viper and my skin has broken, so now it's better to put me outside the monastery so that the poison won't spread again.

source_sentence: 「尊者舍利子！
translation: "Venerable Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 若我取著，眼是我眼是我所；耳鼻舌身意是我，意是我所；色是我，色是我所；聲香味觸法是我，法是我所；地界是我，地界是我所；水火風空識界是我，識界是我所；色蘊是我，色蘊是我所；受想行識蘊是我，識蘊是我所；我若取著如是等法，面及諸根可有異相。
translation: If I were to attach to this, the eye is I and the eye is mine; the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind are I and the mind is mine; form is I and form is mine; sound, smell, taste, and touch are I and form is mine; the earth realm is I and the earth realm is mine; the consciousness realm of water, fire, air, and space is I and the consciousness realm is mine; the form aggregate is I and the form aggregate is mine; the aggregate of feeling, perception, volition, and consciousness is I and the consciousness aggregate is mine; and if I were to attach to such things, my face and my faculties could have different characteristics.

source_sentence: 「尊者舍利子！
translation: "Venerable Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 我不如是取著諸法，謂眼是我，眼是我所；乃至識蘊是我，識蘊是我所；今此何故面及諸根有是異相？」
translation: I don't thus attach to things, which are: 'The eye is self, and the eye is what belongs to self; even the aggregate of consciousness is self, and the aggregate of consciousness belongs to self; why do these things now differ with respect to the face and the faculties?'"

source_sentence: 舍利子言：「尊者隨勇！
translation: Śāriputra said, "Venerable, please be brave!

source_sentence: 若我、我所見及我慢等斷取著已，復能了知所斷根本永斷無餘，如破多羅樹心不復更生，證無生法者，彼復何有異相可得？」
translation: If, after eliminating attachment to self, views of self, and conceit of self, one can also understand that the root of what's being eliminated is permanently eliminated without remainder, just as when the mind of a broken palm tree is no longer reborn and the dharma of nonproduction is realized, how could there be any different characteristics to attain?"

source_sentence: 時尊者舍利子，以尊者隨勇置僧坊外，僵仆于地。
translation: Venerable Śāriputra then placed Venerable Śrī Siṃhala outside the saṃgha hall and fell to the ground.

source_sentence: 爾時尊者舍利子，即說伽陀曰：「智者善行於梵行，　　復常善修正道因，　臨捨壽時喜心生，　　如重病人得輕差。
translation: Venerable Śāriputra then said to the Gṛdhrakūṭa, "A wise man who well practices the religious life and always well corrects the causes of the path becomes happy when he approaches the end of his life, just like a person who's seriously ill and attains a lighter state of relief.

source_sentence: 智者善行於梵行，　　復常善修正道因，　臨捨壽時喜心生，　　猶如棄置惡毒器。
translation: A wise person who well practices the religious life and always well corrects the causes of the path becomes joyous when he approaches the end of his life, just like a person who's discarded a bad poisonous vessel.

source_sentence: 智者善行於梵行，　　復常善修正道因，　能頴脫於捨報時，　　如人出離於火宅。
translation: A wise person who well practices the religious life and always well-corrects the causes of the path is able to escape when the rewards of equanimity are avoided, like a person emerging from a burning house.

source_sentence: 智行梵行修正道，　　悉觀世間如草木，　都無義利無所成，　　畢竟一切無繫著。」
translation: Wise in the practice of celibacy and the cultivation of the path, he observes the world as grass and trees, which lack meaning and benefit and accomplish nothing, and are ultimately unattached."

source_sentence: 爾時，尊者舍利子為隨勇尊者安置事已，往詣佛所，到已頭面禮世尊足，具陳上事。
translation: Venerable Śāriputra then, having placed Venerable Śrī Siṃyong in his service, went to the Buddha, bowed his head and face at the Bhagavān's feet when he arrived, and explained the above matters.

source_sentence: 佛言：「舍利子！
translation: The Buddha said, "Śāriputra!

source_sentence: 彼隨勇善男子，若於爾時得聞我說勝妙伽陀及大明章句，彼定不為毒蛇所蠚，潰壞其身。」
translation: If they are brave and good sons who follow me at that point were to hear me teach the phrases and words of the Resplendent Gateways and Great Instructions, they certainly wouldn't be stung by a viper that would break their bodies."

source_sentence: 舍利子白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Śāriputra said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 何等勝妙伽陀？
translation: What is the most sublime gāthā?

source_sentence: 何等大明章句？
translation: What kind of great luminous chapter and verse?

source_sentence: 願為我說。」
translation: Please explain this for me."

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊即說伽陀曰：「持國天王我行慈，　　愛囉嚩尾龍亦然，　阿說多哩劍末羅，　　悉體埵子悉慈愛。
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān spoke to Gadha, saying, "I, the king of the guardian gods, practice kindness, as does the dragon Airāvaṇa, and so does the dragon Aśvatakamālā, the son of Siddhârtha, who shows kindness.

source_sentence: 廣目天王我行慈，　　黑瞿曇龍慈亦然，　難陀烏波難陀龍，　　彼二行慈亦如是。
translation: I, the wide-eyed god king, practice kindness, as does the Kālodānara dragon, and so does the Nandana-umba-nandana dragon, who both practice kindness.

source_sentence: 我於無足行慈愛，　　二足四足亦復然，　及彼多足諸有情，　　等行慈心悉無異。
translation: I practice loving kindness when I have no legs, and so do I have two legs and four legs, and there are many sentient beings who practice loving kindness equally, without distinction.

source_sentence: 一切龍等行慈愛，　　彼龍棲止大海中，　於諸有情普慈心，　　若情若器皆如是。
translation: All dragons and so forth practice loving kindness, and they stand in the ocean, showing compassion to all sentient beings, whether they are beings or vessels.

source_sentence: 所有一切有情類，　　乃至蜎飛及蠕動，　普願銷除病惱因，　　一切獲得安隱樂；　所有一切有情類，　　乃至蜎飛及蠕動，　普以賢善平等觀，　　一切蠲除諸罪惡。
translation: All sentient beings, even larvae and wrigglers, wish to remove the causes of illness and discomfort, and all attain peace and happiness; all sentient beings, even larvae and wrigglers, observe goodness and equality, and all are freed from sins and evil.

source_sentence: 蛇之為毒極猛熾，　　其毒能壞人身命，　而彼蛇窟山峯中，　　我常處之而遊上。
translation: The snake's venom is extremely fierce, and its poison can destroy a person's life, but I've always traveled up to that snake's cave on a mountain peak.

source_sentence: 我為無上世間師，　　我常宣說真實語，　以我真實語業因，　　我身蛇毒不能入。
translation: I'm the unsurpassed worldly teacher, and I always proclaim the true words, for the cause of my true speech karma, the venom of the snake in my body can't enter.

source_sentence: 所有貪瞋及癡法，　　此三世間為大毒，　世尊大覺毒不侵，　　佛真實力能破毒，　所有貪瞋及癡法，　　此三世間為大毒，　世尊正法毒不侵，　　法真實力能破毒；　所有貪瞋及癡法，　　此三世間為大毒，　世尊淨眾毒不侵，　　僧真實力能破毒，　世間所有諸毒中，　　而彼貪毒最為上，　唯佛能破能攝持，　　由斯諸毒皆息滅。」
translation: All craving, ill-will, and delusion are great poisons in these three worlds, but the Bhagavān, the greatly enlightened one, is not attacked by poison, and the true strength of the Buddha is able to break through that poison; all craving, ill-will, and delusion are great poisons in these three worlds, but the Bhagavān, the pure one, is not attacked by poison, and the true strength of the saṃgha is able to break through that poison.

source_sentence: 爾時，世尊說大明曰：「怛[寧*也](切身)佗(一句)　唵(引)凍蜜里(引)(二)　凍蜜里(引)(三)　凍彌(引)(四)　鉢囉(二合)凍彌(引)(五)　那致(引)(六)　蘇那致(引)(七)　計(引)嚩致(引)(八)　母那曳(引)(九)　薩三摩曳(引)(十)　難帝(引)(十一)　難底里(引)(十二)　泥(引)里(引)(十三)　泥(引)羅計(引)尸(引)(十四)　嚩(引)里(引)(十五)　嚩(引)羅計(引)尸(引)(十六)　嗢里(引)(十七)　泥羊(二合)虞(引)里(引)莎(引)賀(引)(十八)」佛言：「舍利子！
translation: 爾時，世尊說大明曰：「怛[寧*也](切身)佗(一句)　唵(引)凍蜜里(引)(二)　凍蜜里(引)(三)　凍彌(引)(四)　鉢囉(二合)凍彌(引)(五)　那致(引)(六)　蘇那致(引)(七)　計(引)嚩致(引)(八)　母那曳(引)(九)　薩三摩曳(引)(十)　難帝(引)(十一)　難底里(引)(十二)　泥(引)里(引)(十三)　泥(引)羅計(引)尸(引)(十四)　嚩(引)里(引)(十五)　嚩(引)羅計(引)尸(引)(十六)　嗢里(引)(十七)　泥羊(二合)虞(引)里(引)莎(引)賀(引)(十八)」佛言：「舍利子！

source_sentence: 彼隨勇善男子！
translation: "They are brave, good sons!

source_sentence: 若於爾時得聞我說如是伽陀及大明章句，彼定不為蛇毒所蠚潰壞其身。」
translation: If they then hear me teach such a statement as this, they surely won't be stung by snake venom and have their bodies destroyed."

source_sentence: 舍利子白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Śāriputra said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 如佛今說勝妙伽陀及此大明章句，彼隨勇苾芻蛇所蠚時，離於佛所，如是妙法其云何得？」
translation: As the Buddha now explains the surpassingly sublime kārttika and this great luminous statement, when he follows the courageous serpents and stings them, how does such a wonderful teaching become available when they leave the Buddha's place?"

source_sentence: 爾時，尊者舍利子說是語已，頭面著地禮世尊足，出於佛會。
translation: After he spoke these words, Venerable Śāriputra bowed his head to the ground at the feet of the Bhagavān and left the Buddha's assembly.

source_sentence: 佛說隨勇尊者經
translation: Sutra of Venerable Śrī Siṃhala
